news_header: Mercedes-Benz faces profit decline; Renault sees growth amid competition.
news_original_title: Mercedes-Benzin voitoista karisi miltei kolmannes – Kiinan-myynti yskii, sähkö­auto­kauppa takeltelee
news_text: Mercedes-Benz's operating profit fell by 28% in 2024 due to decreased sales in China and electric vehicles. In contrast, Renault's sales rose by 7.4%.
